title: Handle a Damaged Goods Claim
description: A retailer reports that part of their recent shipment arrived damaged.

tasks.description: Receive the claim from the retailer, including photos of the damaged items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent logs the claim and saves the photos.

tasks.description: Verify the claim against the order details.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the damaged items were part of the recent order.

tasks.description: Issue a credit memo to the retailer for the value of the damaged goods.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a credit memo on the retailer's account.

tasks.description: Arrange for a replacement shipment of the damaged items.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new, no-charge sales order for the replacement items.
